definition: straight/to straighten/fair and reasonable/frank/straightforward/(indicates continuing motion or action)/vertical/vertical downward stroke in Chinese characters
surname Zhi/Zhi (c. 2000 BC), fifth of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God

sentences.english: I just emphasized different elements in a way to manipulate your intuitions.
sentences.chinese: 我只是強調了不同的要素來操縱你們的直覺。

sentences.english: Depend on intuition and experience, he ases if the key that found baseball of the gold dollar that defeat solution.
sentences.chinese: 憑藉直覺和經驗，他彷彿找到了破解金元棒球的鑰匙。

sentences.english: It uses people's instinct and ignorant of science to try to blemish Soya Bean Salad Oil.
sentences.chinese: 是在利用人們的直覺和世俗感覺來抹黑大豆色拉油。

sentences.english: Metaphysic is the finding of bad reasons for what we believe on instinct.
sentences.chinese: 形而上學是我們爲相信直覺而找到的壞理由。

sentences.english: Therefore, many notions that apply to rings and homomorphisms stem from geometric intuition.
sentences.chinese: 從而，環與同態中許多概念都源於幾何直覺。

sentences.english: P29 My instincts were telling me to turn back before things got out of hand.
sentences.chinese: 直覺會在事情超出控制的時候告訴我返回。

sentences.english: He's an  excellent boss with a feminine  intuition.
sentences.chinese: 他是一個有着女性的直覺的優秀的老闆。

sentences.english: But don't over-intellectualize your emotional reaction. Instead, get out of your head and trust your instincts.
sentences.chinese: 不要不要對自己的情感過於理智，相信你的直覺。

sentences.english: Intuition and experience are of far greater value in applying frequency tables.
sentences.chinese: 在尋找密碼錶時，直覺和經驗更爲重要。

sentences.english: Every decision to act is an intuitive one .
sentences.chinese: 每一個行動決策都是憑直覺作出的。

sentences.english: Trust your instincts and listen "with a third ear".
sentences.chinese: 相信你的直覺並用第三隻耳朵傾聽。

sentences.english: This approach might seem counter-intuitive to many managers.
sentences.chinese: 對於很多管理人員來說，這種方法似乎是違背直覺的。

sentences.english: And it's counter-intuitive to some extent.
sentences.chinese: 在一定程度上這是反直覺的。

sentences.english: It lies in the blend of clearheaded logic and powerful intuition .
sentences.chinese: 它是清晰的邏輯和強有力的直覺的融合。

definition: attitude (of the heart)/state of one's psyche/way of thinking/mentality
